name: Family Bowling 3D
synopsis: Family Bowling 3D is a game in which anyone can enjoy bowling with simple controls. A bowling game featuring Billy, Sarah, Daddy, and Mommy! The three game modes include Main Mode, where you'll battle your fellow family members; Free Play, where you can play as you like with 1-4 players; and Challenge Mode, where you can take difficult challenges head on! You can bowl however you would like by selecting your position, direction, speed, and curve. Aim for a perfect game in all of the five different stages we've assembled!
